doc:
Shari Belafonte https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shari_Belafonte 0 Shari Lynn Belafonte (born September 22, 1954) is an American actress, model, writer and singer. The raspy-voiced daughter of singer Harry Belafonte, she is known for her role as Julie Gilette on the 1980s television series Hotel and as a spokesperson for the diet supplement Slim-Fast during the 1990s. Shari_Lynn_Belafonte ( born September_22_,_1954 ) is an_American_actress , model_,_writer_and_singer . The_raspy-voiced_daughter of singer_Harry_Belafonte , she is_known for her_role as Julie_Gilette on the_1980s_television_series_Hotel and as a_spokesperson for the_diet_supplement_Slim-Fast during the_1990s .
